LanguageData.BM_SpacerHemofilterUtilityModule.label: hemofilter module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerHemofilterUtilityModule.descrip: A high-tech device that can be installed into a heart or any compatible artificial heart replacement. This particular model is equipped with a variety of advanced filters that help break down and eliminate harmful elements from the host’s blood.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerBiowelderUtilityModule.label: biowelder module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerBiowelderUtilityModule.descript: A high-tech device that can be installed into a heart or any any compatible artificial heart replacement. This particular model frequently releases a small swarm of biowelder mechanites throughout the host's body, greatly increasing the rate at which their wounds heal.
LanguageData.BM_SpacerCoagulatorUtilityModule.label: coagulator module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerCoagulatorUtilityModule.descrip: A high-tech device that can be installed into a heart or any any compatible artificial heart replacement. This particular model releases coagulating factors in response to blood loss, reducing bleeding rate significantly.
